text: Fusiturridae is a family of small to medium-sized sea snails, marine gastropod mollusks in the superfamily Conoidea.MolluscaBase eds. (2020). MolluscaBase. Fusiturridae Abdelkrim, Aznar-Cormano, Fedosov, Kantor, Lozouet, Phuong, Zaharias & Puillandre, 2018. (2018). Exon-capture based phylogeny and diversification of the venomous gastropods (Neogastropoda, Conoidea). Molecular Biology and Evolution. 35(10): 2355-2374 Category:Conoidea
title: Fusiturridae
